name: Jury, when of right
text: When the right of trial by jury is given by the Constitution or a statute of the United States or this State and the right has not been waived, the case shall be tried with a jury. [CC 1859, §1130; am L 1909, c 23, §1; RL 1925, §2367; RL 1935, §4098; RL 1945, §10108; RL 1955, §231-8; HRS ; am L 1972, c 89, §2B(c)]
